义务教育教科书五年级上册义务教育教科书英 语五年级上册 （三年级起点） （三年级起点） ENGLISH 英语 产品绿色印刷产品全国价格举报电话：12315 定价：6.00元 
[中国] 河北 教育 出版 社 [加拿大] DC加拿大国际交流中心合作编写 ENGLISH 义务教育教科书英语五年级上册 （三年级起点） 
亲爱的同学们，欢迎你们进入五年级！ 这学期你们将再一次学习用英语介绍家庭成员，学习我们祖国及一些说英语国家的人文地理知识，了解关于旅行以及中国的主要传统节日等方面的内容。 你们想知道李明的大家庭有多少人吗？他们都是谁呢？想知道他们的喜好及职业吗？ 你们想了解主要英语国家的名称、首都以及名胜吗？ 你们想知道李明邀请丹尼和詹妮去哪儿旅行吗？他们都为旅行做了哪些准备？ 你们想知道过春节的一些习俗怎么用英语表达吗？端午节和中秋节用英语怎么说呢？那就开始我们这学期的学习吧！ 同学们，随着年级的升高，你们识记了越来越多的词语，你们的阅读能力也随之得到了提高。从这学期开始，你们将尝试阅读较长的对话和短文。 希望你们制定适当的阅读计划，多阅读英语故事及其他英语读物。在阅读中， 你们要养成良好的阅读习惯，能借助图片或通过上下文来理解文本，学着用英汉小词典查生词。相信你们一定会乐在其中！ 致同 学

content: 4 Lesson 2 What Do They Look Like? 1 Who are they? My grandfather is eighty-one years old. He has white hair. My grandmother is seventy-five years old. She has white hair, too. My parents and I have black hair. We all have black eyes. My uncle, aunt and my cousin Jing have black hair and black eyes, too. My father is tall. My mother is short. Uncle Dachao is tall and thin. Aunt Meiping is short. Look at Jing and me. I have short hair, but Jing has long hair.

content: 67 7 ★ Talk and act 8 The rabbit is the fourth; the dragon is the fifth; the snake is the sixth; the horse is the seventh; the sheep is the eighth; the monkey is the ninth; the rooster is the tenth; the dog is the eleventh; and the pig is the twelfth. Later, the cat comes. He also wants to be the first. He meets the tiger on the way. Why are you so early, Tiger? The meeting is in the afternoon. And that is why cats always eat rats. 9 ● Do you like the rat in the story? Why or why not? ● Act out the story. No, it was in the morning. You are late. You bad rat! I’ll eat you. Help! Help! Okay. Here’s the order of the years. I think twelve animals are good for the names of years.

content: 81 A Wonderful Trip Daisy lives in the U.S. on a small farm. She lives with her parents and her two little brothers. Her parents are farmers. They plant flowers, fruits and vegetables on their farm. Daisy likes to help on the farm. She also loves to go for walks. One sunny morning, Daisy goes for a long, long walk. She walks very, very far. The sky gets cloudy. Suddenly, a great, strong wind comes and lifts Daisy up into the sky and carries her far, far away.

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5.pdf

content: 82 Daisy looks around. “What is this place ? Where am I ? ” She is sure this is not her small farm. There are beautiful flowers, trees and green grass, but no fruits and vegetables. Daisy feels scared and tired. She sits under a tree to have a rest. Then Daisy hears a noise. It sounds like crying. “Who is there ? ” cries Daisy. “Me!” a tiny voice squeaks. “Don’t be afraid!” “Who are you ? Where am I ? And why are you crying ? ” asks Daisy. “I am Birdie and you are in TazLand. I am crying because I can’t fly!” “Oh, you poor little bird! Can I help you ? ” “Maybe,” says Birdie. “I want to go to see the Magical Doctor Taz. He knows magic words. He can help me fly.” “Maybe he can help me get home!” cries Daisy! “Your home is very far from here, but Dr. Taz can help you. Let’s go together to see him. You can carry me!” says Birdie. Daisy is happy. “OK! Let’s go!”

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5.pdf

content: 83 On their way to visit Dr. Taz, Daisy and Birdie meet a horse named Honey. Honey is tall and thin, but she can’t run. So Daisy, Birdie and Honey all go to visit Dr. Taz. On their way, they see a lake. They stop to drink some water. They see a fish next to the lake. His name is Sam. Sam can’t swim. Yes, you can come with us! May I also come with you to visit Dr. Taz? He can help me run! Yes, you can come with us! Oh, may I come with you to see Dr. Taz? He can help me swim.

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5.pdf

content: 84 So Daisy, Birdie, Honey and Sam the fish travel a long, long way. It takes a long, long time, but they finally get to Dr. Taz’s palace. “Please help us, Magical Doctor Taz! Please say the magic words!” they cry. Dr. Taz is a good and friendly man. He wants to help them, so he says the magic words. ! Sam can swim! Honey can run! Birdie can fly! lift 举起 carry 带着 around 到处 scared 恐惧的，害怕的 tiny 小的 squeak 吱吱叫 Dr. 博士（ Doctor 的缩写） us 我们 word 词；话语 poof 噗的一声 still 仍然；依旧 tap 轻踏 Please help me, Dr. Taz! I want to go home! Do you see those red shoes on your feet? Just tap your red shoes and you will be home before you can count to three. POOF Daisy closes her eyes, taps her shoes together and counts: One… two… She opens her eyes and sees her family and her small farm. She is so happy to see her parents and her two little brothers. But Daisy isn‘t at home. She is still in TazLand. She starts to cry.

content: 85 A Little Horse Crosses the River A mother horse and a little horse live on a farm. One day, the mother horse asks the little horse to carry a bag to the mill. “Can you do this work for me ? ” asks his mum. “Sure, Mum,” says the little horse. 86 On the way, there is a river. The little horse stops and thinks, “Is the river deep ? Can I cross it ? ” A cow comes along. The little horse asks the cow, “Excuse me, can I cross the river ? ” “Yes, you can. The water is not deep at all,” says the cow. The little horse begins to cross the river. 87 “Don’t cross the river, little horse!” a squirrel j umps down from a tree and cries. “It’s very deep. Yesterday, one of my friends was lost in this river.” The little horse doesn’t know what to do next. He goes home and asks his mother.

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5.pdf

content: 88 “Why do you come back, my child ? ” the mother horse asks. “The cow says the river is not deep, Mum. But the squirrel says it is very deep. What can I do ? ” “My child, go and try yourself. Then you’ll know what to do.” The little horse comes back to the river and crosses it. Now he knows how deep the river is. So don’t always listen to others. Sometimes you need to try it by yourself. cross 渡过 mill 磨坊 deep 深的；有……深 squirrel 松鼠 try 试；试做 89 The Story of Nian Nian is strong. It has a very big mouth. It lives in the sea. It sleeps for 364 days a year. On the eve of the Spring Festival, it wakes up and comes out of the sea. It is hungry. It wants to eat animals and people. 90 An old man and an old woman are in their house. The old man is sick. “I’m sick. I can’t run.” “I’ll stay with you,” says his wife. The old woman makes dumplings for her husband. When the Spring Festival comes, people run to the mountains. They are afraid of Nian.

metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）五年级上册_0482ccb5.pdf

content: 91 A poor old man comes to the door. He is thin. He is hungry. The old woman gives him some dumplings to eat. “I’m afraid you have to go,” says the old woman. “Nian is coming, and it will eat us!” “Don’t be afraid,” says the poor old man. “I can help you.” He puts red paper on the door. In the evening, Nian comes. The poor old man goes out in red clothes. He lights some firecrackers and scares Nian. 92 Nian is scared. It is afraid of the colour red and firecrackers. It runs away very fast. “Thank you!” the old couple say to the poor old man. So that is why, on the Spring Festival, people put red paper on the door, wear red clothes, and light firecrackers. They needn’t run to the mountains anymore. strong 强壮的 sea 大海 wife 妻子 husband 丈夫 give 给 ﬁ recracker 鞭炮 couple 一对，一双 anymore 再；更
